categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Riz Ahmed (born December 2, 1982) is an English actor and rap artist of Pakistani descent. He portrayed Bodhi Rook in the Star Wars Anthology Series film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. Even though receiving the role of Bodhi Rook, he continued to spam Rogue One director Gareth Edwards with audition tapes. Ahmed has also worked in several other films including the comedy Four Lions, The Reluctant Fundamentalist, Nightcrawler, Jason Bourne, Venom, and the television series The Night Of and The OA.
